relation: Meal plan makes it easy to access and dining hall on campus. Good variety too. However, they close down a lot of the dining halls during the weekends.
They give you a choice of which dorm you would like to be in. On-campus housing/apartments are also available at Radford.
Academic rigor at Radford is becoming more and more demanding.
Set yourself challenging, but realistic goals that you want to achieve during the semester. Do not study the night before; start studying a week in advance up until the test.

Radford's teacher to student ratio is the perfect size. Radford has a very good Communications of Sciences and Disorders program. Radford is not as diverse as I would like it to be, but it is growing each year.
pageTitle: Radford University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {376297=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 322984=We have Quadfest every year in April which is quickly declining considering the increase in police., 284986=Well, there is Quadfest, which occurs the week before finals in April, which is basically one huge week of partying., 47339=if you are a prospective student, i recommend that you contact your roommate as soon as you receive their information, so you each know what the other is bringing. that way you won’t bring two of something that you aren’t allowed to have, like a microwave. you should also save money up or give your parents a warning that payments for the fall semester, actually start in june., 128145=We are on the parade route for many parades the locals enjoy. Highlanders Day Weekend in October is fun, free, and load. It takes place mainly on Campus. On Snow days you HAVE TO BUILD SNOWMEN EVERYWHERE AND IGLOOS AND GO SLEDDING DOWN MASSIVE HILLS.}
